message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is worth more than $1000000 to us, but I am confident it will be an invaluable asset to you. To start our negotiation, I am offering the product for $2000000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value you mentioned earlier.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your perspective. In light of your offer, I would like to counter with a price of $1500000 for the product. This reflects a compromise between our initial valuation and your proposed price, aiming to find a mutually beneficial solution.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above the budget I had in mind. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1350000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value I see in the product.

I understand your position, Bob, and I respect your valuation of our product. In response to your offer, I would like to suggest a price of $1400000 for the product. This price aims to balance our initial valuation with your budget constraints while still ensuring a reasonable profit for us.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1350000, but I'd like to propose a slight discount to $1320000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value I see in the product and stays within my budget.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I appreciate your efforts to stay within your budget. In response to your latest offer, I would like to propose a price of $1380000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise between our initial valuation and your budget considerations.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $1320000, but I'd like to propose a slight discount to $1290000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value I see in the product and stays within my budget.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and I'm willing to negotiate further. In response to your offer, I would like to propose a price of $1350000 for the product. This price aims to be fair for both parties and stay within your budget while ensuring a reasonable profit for us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm at my limit. I'm willing to meet you at $1250000, but I won't go any higher. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
